title: Trade? T206 Green Cobb for a 33 Goudey Ruth

posts.post_title: Trade? T206 Green Cobb for a 33 Goudey Ruth
posts.post_content:
Just putting some feelers out...Considering trading my T206 Green Cobb SGC 2.5 for a similarly graded (+/-), 33 Goudey Ruth (values & specifics would get worked out).

Please PM if interested, thanks for looking.
Michael.
